statements: SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE total_order_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_email, total_order_amount FROM customers WHERE last_purchase_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, total_order_amount FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, last_purchase_date FROM customers WHERE customer_email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY total_order_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, total_order_amount FROM customers WHERE total_order_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, last_purchase_date FROM customers WHERE last_purchase_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, total_order_amount FROM customers WHERE total_order_amount < 500 ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT name, email FROM Customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_id, name, city FROM Customers ORDER BY city DESC;
SELECT * FROM Orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT name, order_date, total_amount FROM Customers JOIN Orders ON Customers.customer_id = Orders.customer_id;
SELECT name, email, city FROM Customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY city ASC;
SELECT * FROM Orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, name, order_date, total_amount FROM Customers JOIN Orders ON Customers.customer_id = Orders.customer_id;
SELECT DISTINCT city FROM Customers WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40;
SELECT name, email FROM Customers WHERE city='New York' AND age < 50 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE registration_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT purchase_id, customer_id, total_amount FROM purchases ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, payment_method, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE status = 'completed';
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT product_name, purchase_date FROM purchases WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_purchases, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM purchases WHERE product_name = 'Shoes';
SELECT c.customer_name, p.product_name, t.payment_method FROM customers c INNER JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id INNER JOIN transactions t ON p.purchase_id = t.purchase_id;

SELECT DISTINCT c.customer_name, c.phone_number, t.status FROM customers c LEFT JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id LEFT JOIN transactions t ON p.purchase_id = t.purchase_id WHERE p.total_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email, total_spent FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, date_of_birth FROM customers ORDER BY date_of_birth ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT customer_name, total_spent FROM customers WHERE total_spent > 500 ORDER BY total_spent DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, total_spent FROM customers WHERE total_spent > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, date_of_birth, email FROM customers WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1980-01-01' AND '1990-12-31';
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY amount DESC, transaction_date ASC;
SELECT segment_name, criteria FROM customer_segments WHERE segment_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE unit_price < 50;
SELECT customer_name, address, registration_date FROM customers WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, age, income FROM demographics WHERE income > 50000 ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, address, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM purchases WHERE purchase_amount > 1000);

SELECT customer_id, product_name, unit_price FROM customers INNER JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id INNER JOIN products ON purchases.product_id = products.product_id WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT customers.customer_id, customers.customer_name, demographics.age, demographics.gender, demographics.income FROM customers LEFT JOIN demographics ON customers.customer_id = demographics.customer_id WHERE demographics.income > 50000;

SELECT p.product_name, c.customer_name, h.customer_segment FROM purchases AS pu INNER JOIN products AS p ON pu.product_id = p.product_id INNER JOIN customers AS c ON pu.customer_id = c.customer_id INNER JOIN high_value_customers AS h ON c.customer_id = h.customer_id ORDER BY h.segment_score DESC;
